content:
Target and Amazon are both great options for finding a throw blanket that matches your rug.

I'm so glad to hear that rearranging your furniture made a positive impact on your living room! Sometimes, a simple swap can make a big difference in the feel and flow of a space. It's amazing how rearranging furniture can open up a room and create a more airy atmosphere.

Rearranging furniture can also help you see your space in a new light and discover new ways to use the room. It's a great way to refresh your space without breaking the bank or doing a major renovation.

If you're feeling inspired, you could try experimenting with different layouts and configurations to see what works best for your living room. You might be surprised at how a simple change can make a big impact!

Remember, it's all about creating a space that feels comfortable and functional for you and your family. So don't be afraid to experiment and try out new ideas. Happy decorating!
